TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ManagementMemberAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary:
This class is used by the WMI.NET Provider Extensions framework. It is the base class for all the management attributes that can be applied to members.
Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries. The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Name parameter of this parent class ensures that all management attributes that apply to members accept a Name parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This is the default constructor.
Gets or sets the name of the management attribute.
Docs.value: Returns a string which is the name of the management attribute.
